379570.name: FSX: Steam Edition - Extra 300S Add-On
379570.description:
The Extra 300S is a single-seat competition and aerobatic aircraft first flown in 1992.

Unlike the original two-seat 300 model, the 300S has only one seat and slightly larger ailerons. The aircraft uses a number of different materials in its construction, including steel, carbon composites, fibreglass and aluminium, all in the name of lightness and performance.

In the air, the 300S boasts a climb rate of more than 3,000 feet per minute and an airframe stressed for manoeuvres up to plus or minus 10G.

The Alabeo Extra 300S for FSX: Steam Edition is a great aircraft to use in the aerobatic missions included in-game. Additionally, the speed and versatility of this aircraft makes it ideal for racing with your friends in multiplayer. Pair it with some detailed scenery for a picturesque aerobatic flight simulation experience!

Features

  • Red paint scheme and plain white paint scheme
  • Aerobatic smoke effect
  • Aerobatic manoeuvres PDF
  • Extra 300S datasheet
